message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you take $30. It's better to secure something now than risk losing value later.
I think we can both do better. I'm offering you $40, which is still more than you'd get if we keep rejecting offers. Let's work together to find a solution that benefits us both.

Bob, it's clear we both want a larger share, but this back and forth is hurting us both. I'm offering you $40. This is more than you would have gotten last round if I accepted, and with inflation, waiting longer will only hurt us more.
